description:
Total 17km, nice rugged sites, well kept trail, well marked. Winding through Bon Echo Provincial Park and around Abes Lake, Essens Lake, and Bon Echo Lake.
This trail is 50km N of:
directions: On hiway 41, drive 49km N of the 401 (North side of Napanee, ON).  And/or 30.6km N of HiWay #7 at Kaladar.  Look for the turn to the West (left if driving N).  Drive 3.4km West to trailhead.
title: Bon Echo
